What is DOM Mode?

DOM Mode is a modern templating system for Unify that uses pure HTML with minimal custom elements.

How It Works

  1. Pages specify layouts with data-layout
  2. Content goes into slots using <template data-slot="name">
  3. Components are included with <include src="..." />
  4. Token replacement happens with data-token attributes
